message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper proposes a framework for online detection of action start in untrimmed videos using deep learning methods. The proposed framework involves action classification and start point localization, which are both common topics in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of policy gradient methods for long-term localization rewards also suggests a potential connection to reinforcement learning (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper evaluates the proposed framework on large-scale datasets, which could be relevant to multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
